item.description:
***The Red Sox Natives are having a small Fundraiser for Boston Happy Hour drinking buddy Mindy Finkelstein who is doing the Run to Home Base race on Sunday, May 22 at Fenway Park. More details are on the redsoxnatives meetup. We will be there from 6-8pm with complimentary apps for you to share from the Bleacher Bar and selling raffle tickets. Prizes include wine and a pair of Red Sox Yankees tickets for a Saturday afternoon game. Drawing to take place around 8pm. We will be staying for Trivia too!*** 

'Let's go back for the newest game in town at Bleacher Bar, Trivia + Bingo = Trivingo. ' Two classic games combined to form an exciting, nonstop, group game.

Jeff, is an awesome game host because he keeps the game moving and entertaining while DJ Frank drops great interlude jams. Ryan, the Bleacher Bar manager has been so accommodating and Joe has got to be the BEST bartender bar none (pun very intended). He's saved our seats at the bar with glasses of water waiting for us and is always so very welcoming, attentive and pleasant.

 

Last month our teams, have proven to be the smahtest in the room. We've won Sox Monster tickets, Bruins tickets and Bleacher Bar tshirts as well as $50 and $10 gift cards. Let's bring more teams so we can win more prizes.

 

 

ADMISSION IS FREE AND THERE IS NO COST TO PLAY TRIVINGO 

 

YOU MUST BE AT LEAST 21 AND PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER - THANK YOU

 

Trivingo begins at 8:00 PM but you're welcome to arrive when you can and stay as long as you're able.

If you're interested in joining a team...please answer the question which appears after you RSVP.

If you come hungry, here's the food and beer menu. There is also a special bucket of ponys for $18 in addition to a respectable assortment of bottled beer as well as on draft.

Bleacher Bar is unique because it is located beneath the Fenway Park bleachers in center field. There's a window which has a great view through centerfield into the park, it is the only view of its kind.

Check out MBTA or Hop Stop to create your route by public transit. Nearest subway station Kenmore on the Green Line, which is about a ten (10) minute walk.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for the Meetup Crews at the bar
item.why: To have a good time while helping out Mindy, a fellow drinking buddy.
